snippet.title: Bloodborne Kart: Eileen the Crow Joins the Race!
snippet.description:
Follow on twitter for updates: twitter.com/b0tster
Music by The Noble Demon: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EbD2ZYISkD0

Hey all, long time no see! On top of the new racer being created, I also made a lot of updates and changes to the game, including:

-"Handling" is now a stat that varies per kart, alongside weight and size. Handling will control the turning speed in and out of drifting, and also...

- Mid-air control, which lets the either pitch back to travel longer distances (when paired with boosting) or pitch forward to return to the ground quicker, on top of the expected turning left and right.

- The piercing rifle now has a reload animation that must be completed before it can be fired a second time to offset the sheer power that can take out a racer in a single shot.

- Doing specific tricks / tasks will display a new 'announcer text' which gives the cool thing the player just did some fanfare.

- Battle mode now supports multiple game types, but that will be covered in a future video!

And that will be all for this vid, thanks so much for sticking with it!
